Description:
Detects modifications to the "Hidden" and "ShowSuperHidden" explorer registry values in order to disable showing of hidden files and system files.
This technique is abused by several malware families to hide their files from normal users.


Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Displaying Hidden Files Feature Disabled
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (target_object like '%\microsoft\windows\currentversion\explorer\advanced\showsuperhidden' or target_object like '%\microsoft\windows\currentversion\explorer\advanced\hidden') and details = 'dword (0x00000000)'
